globant.title: Full Stack Developer
globant.description:
Customer: Santander Bank (Broker)

Participation in the development of the Broker and internal Platform for the client Santander Bank:
- Development of micro frontends for the Santander Valores web broker using React.js, React Query, Jest, and micro frontends architecture.
- Design and development of components for the internal investment platform using React.js, React Query, Jest, and micro frontends.
- Design and development of components for the internal component library using React.js and Jest.
- Development of backend microservices for the API that supports the internal investment platform.

contractor.title: Full Stack Developer
contractor.description:
Development of a stock control web application for a plant nursery:
- Designed and developed both the frontend and backend using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MySQL.
- Implemented functionalities to manage inventory, track products, and generate real-time stock reports.

Development of a catalog-style web application for a shoe store:
- Created a comprehensive web application enabling the shoe store to display its product catalog online.
- Used React.js for the frontend and Node.js with Express.js for the backend, along with MySQL for database management.
- Developed product search, filtering, and management functionalities.

Participation in the development of a mobile app for a bromatology company:
- Developed a RESTful API using Node.js and Express.js.
- The API enabled integration with a mobile application, facilitating the uploading and management of bromatology inspection reports.
- Worked on optimizing queries and data structures in MySQL to improve system performance and scalability.
